definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: In this case, Discharging termination voltage means 1.0voltage per cell.
sentences.chinese: 中止放電電壓規定爲每節電池1V。

sentences.english: For me , I should try to save electricity in my daily life .
sentences.chinese: 對於我來說，我應該努力節電在我的日常生活。

sentences.english: With a cell and a wire, can you make two bulbs light up?
sentences.chinese: 僅用一根導線和一節電池能讓兩個小燈泡亮起來嗎？

sentences.english: Mr. Wei panic, and he suspected grandson swallowed another cell.
sentences.chinese: 魏先生慌了，他懷疑是孫子吞了另一節電池。

sentences.english: Most flashlights work on two batteries.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的手電筒用兩節電池。

sentences.english: According to the rules, there should be people especially assigned in a power network to save electrical power.
sentences.chinese: 按照規定，電力網應設有專責人員負責節電工作。

sentences.english: Do not move the cover or live working when this product is drive into conduction.
sentences.chinese: 節電器在通電過程中，請勿打開面蓋或進行帶電作業。

sentences.english: No-load loss, with the traditional machine than can be saving 50%.
sentences.chinese: 空載損耗小，與傳統焊機比，可節電50%。

sentences.english: Forbid link alternating current to the output side.
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁將交流輸入電源接至節電器輸出端上。

sentences.english: With little no-load loss, compared to traditional welder, it can save electricity about50%
sentences.chinese: 空載損耗小，與傳統焊機比，可節電50%。

sentences.english: Can you make a bulb light up only with a wire and a cell?Look at some pictures.
sentences.chinese: 僅用一根導線和一節電池能讓小燈泡亮起來嗎？

sentences.english: This walkman only needs one battery.
sentences.chinese: 這款隨身聽只需要一節電池。

sentences.english: Thus, each cell's voltage must be monitored to determine state of charge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必須監視每節電池的電壓，以確定充電狀態。

sentences.english: Throw a battery into a glass of water, then drink it in half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 扔一節電池到一杯水裏，半小時後喝掉。

sentences.english: Even if your system is super efficient, you still pay the flat rate.
sentences.chinese: 即使您的系統超級節電，您還是需要付固定的費用。

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
